name: HW_ForgeMSS_BOM_CS-MSS-Sec-Tok
action: [IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(Secure Remote Access.Yes)*>,[GT](<*VALUE(Number of Tokens Required)*>,0))){<*SELECTVALUES(Secure Remote Access Token BOM:CS-MSS-SEC-TOK|CS-MSS-SEC-TOK-ANL)*><*SETATVQTY(Secure Remote Access Token BOM:CS-MSS-SEC-TOK, <*VALUE(Number of Tokens Required)*>)*><*SETATVQTY(Secure Remote Access Token BOM:CS-MSS-SEC-TOK-ANL, <*VALUE(Number of Tokens Required)*>)*>}{<*RESETATTRIBUTE(Secure Remote Access Token BOM)*>}[ENDIF]
